definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: make light of, toss aside (cf. As. salû, throw off, shake off (yoke) Dl:500; Ar. slw, sala0 is be forgetful, neglectful Lane:1417; Aram. [[סְלָא]] despise, slo0 reject);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[סָלִיתָ]] Ps 119:118 thou dost make light of all those that err from thy statutes.—Cf. also [[סַלּוֹן]] infr.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: intens. Pf. 3 ms. [[סִלָּה]] La 1:15 Adonay hath flouted at my mighty ones.
